articles.description: Rising stars Emerald Fennell, Daniel Kaluuya and Rocks' Bukky Bakray all scooped awards
articles.content: In a year where we havent been able to go anywhere, the magic of film has transported us everywhere, was the caption that opened tonights Bafta Film Awards. But as they were filling out their ballots… [+2571 chars]

articles.author: Tracy Wright, Brian Marks
articles.title: Carey Mulligan looks casually cool in jeans as she steps out with husband Marcus Mumford after SNL - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 35-year-old actress rocked a pair of jeans and a loose blouse while heading out in Manhattan as her rockstar beau followed closely behind.
articles.content:
She made her hosting debut on Saturday Night Live last night.
And Carey Mulligan looked casually cool the next morning as she left her hotel in New York with husband Marcus Mumford on Sunday.
The 3… [+15194 chars]
